    Constructs a DAOProvider and initializes all DAO instances using a singleton DatabaseManager.

    DatabaseManager - Class in app.tracktune.utils
    Dedicated class for data manipulation Using singleton pattern
    DatabaseManager.ResultSetProcessor<T> - Interface in app.tracktune.utils
    lambda expression (processor type) that contains the result set management
    DB_CONN_FAILED - Static variable in class app.tracktune.utils.Strings
     
    DBInit - Class in app.tracktune.utils
    Class containing all the statements to create database structure Used this approach because the init db is faster and more efficient, because SQLite library functions accept string parameters
    DBInit() - Constructor for class app.tracktune.utils.DBInit
     
    dbManager - Static variable in class app.tracktune.Main
    Singleton instance of the DatabaseManager used to manage DB operations.
